name: Titanic 2: Ice-olated
description:
After the accident with the Titanic, White Star Line had to salvage their reputation somehow.
What better way than creating a truly unsinkable ship, Titanic 2?

Play as Gunnar, the only person willing to board Titanic 2 on her maiden voyage. Equipped with an oar and his favorite duck floatie, Gunnar will do anything he can to ensure this ship makes it to port.

goal of the game:
Try do push away all potential dangers from the Unsinkable Titanic 2. It gets very dark out at sea, but Gunnar is equipped with the best flashlight he could get, so that he will be able to see the icebergs before they hit.

Instructions:

WASD to move
The mousecursor controls the direction of the stick and the flashlight.
Walk into the icebergs with the stick pointed at them to move them out of the way
